title: Réunion
summary: Réunion (French: La Réunion, [la ʁe.y.njɔ̃] (listen); Reunionese Creole: La Réunion; previously Île Bourbon) is an island in the Indian Ocean that is an overseas department and region of France. It is located approximately 550 km (340 mi) east of the island of Madagascar and 175 km (109 mi) southwest of the island of Mauritius. As of January 2021, it had a population of 858,450.[1]
